errors.name: CurveAlreadyCompleted
errors.msg: Can not swap after the curve is completed

errors.name: ReturnAmountTooSmall
errors.msg: Return amount is too small compared to the minimum received amount

errors.name: NotWhiteList
errors.msg: This creator is not in whitelist

errors.name: InsufficientTokens
errors.msg: Not enough tokens to complete the sell order.

errors.name: InsufficientSol
errors.msg: Not enough USDC/collateral to complete operation

errors.name: NotBondingCurveMint
errors.msg: This token is not a bonding curve token

errors.name: InvalidStartTime
errors.msg: Start time is in the past

errors.name: InvalidEndTime
errors.msg: End time is in the past

errors.name: RESOLUTIONYESAMOUNTERROR
errors.msg: The winner yes token amount error.

errors.name: RESOLUTIONNOAMOUNTERROR
errors.msg: The winner no token amount error.

errors.name: PoolAlreadySeeded
errors.msg: Pool has already been seeded with initial liquidity

errors.name: InvalidLiquidityRatio
errors.msg: Liquidity ratio mismatch: USDC, YES, and NO must maintain pool proportions (max 1% deviation)

errors.name: MarketResolvedLpLocked
errors.msg: Market is resolved, LP withdrawal locked until all settlements complete

errors.name: InvalidMint
errors.msg: Invalid token mint for this ATA

errors.name: MarketBelowMinLiquidity
errors.msg: Market collateral reserve below minimum trading liquidity threshold

errors.name: TokenAlreadyInUse
errors.msg: NO token mint is already in use (supply > 0). Each market must use a fresh NO mint.

errors.name: PoolNotSettled
errors.msg: Pool has not been settled yet

errors.name: CollateralStillLocked
errors.msg: Collateral is still locked, cannot reclaim dust

errors.name: LPSharesStillExist
errors.msg: LP shares still exist, cannot reclaim dust

errors.name: TradeSizeTooLarge
errors.msg: Trade size exceeds maximum allowed (10% of pool reserve)

errors.name: PoolTooImbalanced
errors.msg: Pool is too imbalanced (|q_yes - q_no| >= 2b), cannot buy majority side

errors.name: MintAuthorityNotTransferred
errors.msg: Mint authority has not been transferred to market PDA yet

errors.name: ExcessiveWithdrawal
errors.msg: Withdrawal amount exceeds current limit (5%-30% based on pool imbalance)

errors.name: CircuitBreakerTriggered
errors.msg: Circuit breaker is active, LP withdrawals are temporarily disabled

errors.name: CircuitBreakerCooldownNotElapsed
errors.msg: Circuit breaker cooldown period (24h) has not elapsed

errors.name: CircuitBreakerConditionsNotMet
errors.msg: Circuit breaker reset conditions not met (pool ratio must be < 3:1)

errors.name: WouldTriggerCircuitBreaker
errors.msg: This withdrawal would trigger the circuit breaker and is rejected

errors.name: CannotEnableInsuranceWithoutPlatformFee
errors.msg: Cannot enable insurance pool without platform fees (platform_fee must be > 0)

errors.name: InvalidInsuranceConfig
errors.msg: Invalid insurance pool configuration (parameters must be <= 10000 bps)

errors.name: TokenSupplyMismatch
errors.msg: Token supply mismatch: pool balance exceeds total minted
